amendment.description: Amendment directs attention to funding levels in the bill for International Narcotics Control and Law Enforcement.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce by $26,300,000 and then increase by the same amount for International Narcotics Control and Law Enforcement.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burton (IN) amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 250 - 172 (Roll no. 45).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Burton (IN).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Burton (IN) amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 250 - 172 (Roll no. 45).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
